about_the_game:
Welcome to Blue Crab Island!
This DLC gives you access to an angler’s paradise just off the Gulf Coast of Mississippi.
Catch 8 new exclusive fish and try out exclusive new tackle and a new bass boat.

MAP FEATURES


This tropical oasis surrounded by both fresh and saltwater gets its name from an abundance of crab species that inhabit its brackish waters, in turn attracting countless predatory fish. What’s more, Blue Crab Island is the largest The Fisherman – Fishing Planet waterway up-to-date, with an overall area encompassing 4km2 (1.54mi2), making it perfect for boat fishing.

8 NEW FISH


Hone your skills and catch 8 new fish:
  • Saltwater giants like the Permit, the Black Drum, the Bonefish, and the Southern Flounder.
  • Freshwater indigenous species such as the Shoal Bass, the Bigmouth Buffalo, and the American Gizzard Shad
  • And everyone’s favorite Speckled Peacock Bass!

EXCLUSIVE NEW BASSBOAT AND TACKLE

Channel your inner explorer NOW with the Scorpius™ Bass Boat, rods, reels, and many saltwater tackles!
  • Garry Scott™ Scorpius™ Bass Boat - Length: 21,1 ft. (645 cm); Width: 6,1 ft. (187 cm); Weight: 2150 lb (975 kg); Engine: 250 hp; Echo Sounder: OEM, Pro
  • SharpCaster™ 210 SE rod - Length: 2.1 m; Lure Weight: 7/8 – 2 1/2 Oz. (24–70 g); Power: X-Heavy; Line Weight: 30-72 lb (14–33 kg); Action: Fast
  • PowerGrab™ 7000 SE reel - Ratio: 6.5:1; Recovery: 37,4""; Capacity: mono 32 (0.5) /140, braid 30 (0.28) /250; Max Drag: 70.5 lb (32 kg)
  • FishCitadel L Plus fish net - Max Single Fish Weight: 220 Lb (100 kg); Total Fish Weight: 551 Lb (250 kg)
  • A flurry of new rigs, lures and saltwater baits
  • MegaSlot™ Storage Box 25
  • 50 000 credits + 20 BaitCoins

short_description: Welcome to Blue Crab Island! Situated off the Gulf Coast of Mississippi, this picturesque island is an angler’s paradise. The canals, local mangrove trees and sawgrass thickets hide plenty of fish, including 8 new species. Make the most out of your trip with an exclusive new bass boat and tackles.
